main event: A strange hovering object, approximately 30 feet in diameter, with a white light on the underside and a red light on the top, was observed over Durenville, Texas on August 25, 1960.
interesting points: The object was observed to move in various directions and then disappear.
The observation lasted for approximately 20 minutes.
The object appeared to be emitting some sort of energy or force field.
There were two witnesses, a local farmer and a local businessman.
The Harvard College Observatory has received several similar reports from the same general area in recent months.
sighted object: a strange hovering craft-like object with lights
witnesses: a local farmer and a local businessman
photographs: no, the report does not mention any photographs
